data.name: Romeo Must Live Artbook
data.detailed_description: Re-live the bard's tale of "Romeo Must Live" with the Official Art Book, displaying the art featured in this comedic reinterpretation. Enjoy these HD delights that are perfectly sized for wallpaper use!
data.about_the_game: Re-live the bard's tale of "Romeo Must Live" with the Official Art Book, displaying the art featured in this comedic reinterpretation. Enjoy these HD delights that are perfectly sized for wallpaper use!
data.short_description: Re-live the bard's tale of "Romeo Must Live" with the Official Art Book, displaying the art featured in this comedic reinterpretation. Enjoy these HD delights that are perfectly sized for wallpaper use!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
